caption: A2A Capabilities
description: Defines optional capabilities supported by an A2A agent.
name: a2a_capabilities

streaming.caption: Streaming
streaming.description: Indicates if the agent supports streaming responses.

push_notifications.caption: Push Notifications
push_notifications.description: Indicates if the agent supports sending push notifications for asynchronous task updates.

extensions.caption: Extensions
extensions.description: List of protocol extensions supported by the agent.

state_transition_history.caption: State Transition History
state_transition_history.description: Indicates if the agent provides a history of state transitions for a task.
